Class WechatMiniProgramRuntime

A IRuntime implementation for wechat mini program.

Things you need to know:

  1. The default size of canvas in wechat mini program is 300x150, which is not the actual size, you need to set the size and ratio by yourself
  2. the api to create offscreen canvas and image object is defined at Canvas class, you need to pass a wx canvas to Runtime to make it work.
  3. Seems wechat mini program does not support bind event programmatically, you need to bind event in element, and call handleTouchEvent instead.

Checkout the mini program demo here: https://developers.weixin.qq.com/s/eo87vimV7DgU

Methods

enableEvents

  • enableEvents(stage: Stage): void

  • Implementation of IRuntime.enableEvents

    • Defined in runtime/WechatMiniProgramRuntime.ts:171

    Add touch events for the Stage instance. Seems wechat mini program does not support bind event programmatically, you need to bind event in element, and call handleTouchEvent instead, for example:

    in wxml file

    <canvas type='2d'
        bindtouchstart='ontouchstart'
        bindtouchmove='ontouchmove'
        bindtouchend='ontouchend'
        bindtouchcancel='ontouchcancel'
></canvas>

    in js file

      ontouchstart: function(e) {
    createts.Runtime.get().handleTouchEvent('touchstart', this.data.stage, e);
  },

  ontouchmove: function(e) {
    createts.Runtime.get().handleTouchEvent('touchmove', this.data.stage, e);
  },

  ontouchend: function(e) {
    createts.Runtime.get().handleTouchEvent('touchend', this.data.stage, e);
  },

  ontouchcancel: function(e) {
    createts.Runtime.get().handleTouchEvent('touchcancel', this.data.stage, e);
  },

    Parameters

    • stage: Stage

      The target Stage instance to be added event handlers.

    Returns void

handleTouchEvent

  • handleTouchEvent(type: string, stage: Stage, e: any): void
    • Defined in runtime/WechatMiniProgramRuntime.ts:190

    Handles touch event, translate the coordinates of multiple touches to stage space and send to stage instance.

    Parameters

    • type: string

      Type of the touch event.

    • stage: Stage

      The stage to receive this event.

    • e: any

      The native touch event.

    Returns void

loadArrayBuffer

  • loadArrayBuffer(task: LoadArrayBufferTask): void

  • Implementation of IRuntime.loadArrayBuffer

    • Defined in runtime/WechatMiniProgramRuntime.ts:62

    Execute a load raw content task.

    1. If the source of content is a relative path, uses wechat file system api to read the file.
    2. If the source is an absolute url, use wechat network api to file a http request to get the content, please note that you must whitelist the domain for your wechat mini program app.

    Parameters

    • task: LoadArrayBufferTask

      The load raw content task to be executed.

    Returns void

loadImage

  • loadImage(task: LoadImageTask): void

  • Implementation of IRuntime.loadImage

    • Defined in runtime/WechatMiniProgramRuntime.ts:95

    Execute a load image task.

    1. If the source of image is a relative path, uses wechat file system api to read the file.
    2. If the source is an absolute url, use wechat network api to file a http request to get the image, please note that you must whitelist the domain for your wechat mini program app.

    Parameters

    • task: LoadImageTask

      The load image task to be executed.

    Returns void
